# HTML

Click [HERE](https://catmailohio.sharepoint.com/:u:/s/CHSP-OAIPH/ESKUeSenSWBGj49pPyq47gwBnUVclCHGCmHIC8oNH7piGQ?e=AbG03o) for an example HTML document

## Example YAML Statement

```{r html-yaml, eval = FALSE, include = TRUE}

---
title: "Title of Document"
subtitle: "Subtitle of Document"
author: "Ohio Alliance for Population Health <br> Your Name"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%B %d, %Y')`"
format: 
  html:
    toc: true
    toc-depth:
    number-sections: false
    toc-location: left
    self-contained: true
mainfont: "Georgia"
bibliography: references.bib
csl: "APA Numeric Superscript Style.csl"
engine: knitr
---
  
```

## Create Your Own
